snippet: The folks at the Farmers' Almanac can be forgiven for feeling smug: The 198-year-old publication correctly predicted the past nasty winter while federal forecasters blew it....

headline.print_headline: Farmers' Almanac Predicts Another Nasty Winter
headline.main: Farmers' Almanac Predicts Another Nasty Winter

lead_paragraph: The folks at the Farmers' Almanac can be forgiven for feeling smug: The 198-year-old publication correctly predicted the past nasty winter while federal forecasters blew it.
